channel.title: Xcode 4.3
channel.description: Anyone know if it's just me or do lambda expressions not work in Xcode 4.3? I've tried setting Language Dialect to C++ 11 and Standard Library to libc++ but I can't get the working. _______________ EDIT: Apparently the version of Clang that Xcode uses doesn't support lambdas, so I'll either have to grab GCC, Clang SVN, or just wait for it to be updated in Xcode

item.title: Xcode 4.3
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

Anyone know if it’s just me or do lambda expressions not work in Xcode 4.3? I’ve tried setting Language Dialect to C++ 11 and Standard Library to libc++ but I can’t get the working.

EDIT: Apparently the version of Clang that Xcode uses doesn’t support lambdas, so I’ll either have to grab GCC, Clang SVN, or just wait for it to be updated in Xcode

Read full topic
